code: @Test public void testPoolIn3SecondsButNoFiles() throws Exception {     deleteDirectory(FTP_ROOT_DIR).     createDirectory(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "slowfile").     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(0).     Thread.sleep(3 * 1000L).     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). }
public void configure() throws Exception {     from(getFtpUrl()).to("mock:result"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from(getFtpUrl()).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
